results.name: a(n) is the GCD of the cototients (A051953) of n and n+1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
mathematica: Map[GCD @@ Map[# - EulerPhi@ # &, #] &, Partition[Range@ 106, 2, 1]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 09 2017 *)
